name: node-stream-inheritance
description: Sample code showing how to subclass node Readable, Writeable, Transform, and Duplex streams.

scripts.test: node_modules/.bin/jshint src/*.js tests/*.js; ./node_modules/.bin/jscs src/*.js tests/*.js; node_modules/.bin/mocha --reporter spec tests | node_modules/.bin/bunyan --output short --level info

author: Adam Loving
